code: import React from'react';import{downloadFileCount}from'../utils/fileDownload';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const FolderResults=_ref=>{let{folderData}=_ref;const handleDownload=()=>{downloadFileCount(folderData);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"folder-results",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Folder Scan Results"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"scan-info",children:["Scanned on: ",folderData.lastScanned.toLocaleString()]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"results-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"path-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Path:"})," ",folderData.path]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"count-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"file-count",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"count-number",children:folderData.fileCount}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{className:"count-label",children:[folderData.fileCount===1?'file':'files'," found"]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDownload,className:"download-btn",title:"Download file count report as text file",children:"\uD83D\uDCE5 Download Count Report"})]}),folderData.files.length>0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"files-list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h3",{children:["Files (",folderData.files.length,"):"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"files-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"files-ul",children:folderData.files.slice(0,50).map((file,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"file-item",children:["\uD83D\uDCC4 ",file]},index))}),folderData.files.length>50&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"more-files",children:["... and ",folderData.files.length-50," more files"]})]})]})]})]});};export default FolderResults;
